New Records: David Brooks scored the fastest goal of the match in the 3rd minute
Neco Williams scored the second goal for Wales in the 38th minute
Key Match Events: David Brooks scored the opening goal for Wales in the 3rd minute
Neco Williams made it 2-0 for Wales in the 38th minute
Teemu Pukki pulled one back for Finland on the stroke of halftime
Brennan Johnson restored the two-goal cushion for Wales in the 47th minute
Dan James scored the fourth goal for Wales in the 86th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Rob Page praised the team's performance and said it was a massive effort to go again on Tuesday
Rob Page also praised Dan James, saying he was fantastic and got the goal he deserved
Miscellaneous Highlights: Wales will play Poland in the playoff final for a place at Euro 2024
The match was played at the Cardiff City Stadium in front of 32,162 fans
Finland had hoped to qualify for their second major tournament after Euro 2020
Others: Wales qualified for the 2022 World Cup finals through the playoffs and are on the cusp of reaching their third successive euros and first since the retirement of talismanic winger Gareth Bale
